dict.acceptation: 门，户；出入口；一家[户]；通道；

sent.orig: In 'the open door', 'open' is an adjective qualifying 'door'.
sent.trans: 在theopendoor这一词组中，open是修饰door的形容词。

sent.orig: We can supply all kinds of door, such as veneer door, solid door door, Fire door.
sent.trans: 我们能提供各种类型的门，如贴皮门，实木门，防火门等。
提供门到门的服务，送货上门。

sent.orig: Old and new customers alike, enthusiastic and thoughtful service, door-door service door.
sent.trans: 新老客户一视同仁，服务热心周到，送货上门，服务上门。

sent.orig: Product has wood door luxury, composite door, door splint.
sent.trans: 产品有实木豪华门、复合门、夹板门。
